Notifications let us tell you important things, like when your Digital Key is ready.
Your Digital Key opens any door you’d normally access with a regular key card. This includes your hotel room, elevators, side entrances, the fitness center and even the parking garage.

"It's easy! Once you’ve checked in online and confirmed your stay, your key will become available in your Hilton Honors app once your room is ready. Select your Digital Key, and your phone will display a prominent Touch to Unlock button when you’re in range of an accessible door. Just tap the Touch to Unlock button and you’re in!"

When your Digital Key is open and within range, it will display a Touch to Unlock button, allowing you to tap to enter. For your hotel room, you’ll need to stand within a few feet of the door. For the parking garage, the lock will recognize your phone from up to 10 feet away.
Of course! You’re welcome to stop by the front desk at any time to pick up a regular key card to use with (or instead of) your Digital Key.

There are a few reasons your key might not be working. Check to ensure your Bluetooth is activated and that you’re standing within a few feet of the door you’re trying to unlock. If it’s still not working, give us a call or stop by the front desk.
If you’re having trouble with check-in or using your Digital Key, please call for assistance. We’re really sorry for the inconvenience.

The following policy will apply at all Conrad® Hotels & Resorts, Hilton Hotels & Resorts, and DoubleTree by Hilton™ hotels with Executive Floor Lounges. Executive Floor Lounges are available only at select properties.

If you are a Gold Hilton Honors guest, you and up to one additional registered guest will be granted complimentary access to the Executive Floor Lounge only if you receive a room upgrade to the Executive Floor or an upgrade to a room type that confers Executive Floor Lounge access benefits.

If you are a Diamond Hilton Honors guest, you and up to one additional registered guest will always enjoy complimentary access to the Executive Floor Lounge, even if you do not receive a room upgrade to the Executive Floor.

Diamond Hilton Honors guests will receive upgrades to preferred rooms, based on availability for the entire stay at the time of check-in. Upgrades for Diamond Hilton Honors guests may include the next-best available room from the room type booked. Upgrades may also be rooms with desirable views, corner rooms, rooms on high floors, rooms with special amenities, rooms on Executive Floors**, or suites, as identified by each property. Some exclusions based on rate and room type may apply. See Terms & Conditions for details.
You can update your preferences up to 24 hours prior to check-in.
Note: If a room upgrade is not available, you will receive both of the remaining benefits.
